definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[דגן]] (√ of foll. mng. dub.; NH [[דַּגֵּן]] Pa. heap up etc. seems to be denom.; Ol:§ 215 b. 4 der. [[דָּגׇן]] fr. [[דָּגׇה]], cf. MV; We:Skizzen iii. 170 inclines to regard [[דָּגׇן]] as der. fr. n.pr. divin. [[דגן]] (cf. [[דָּגוֹן]]), as cereal fr. Ceres).
